# Pizzeria Mamma Mia - Flutter App Project

## Project Overview
Multi-platform ordering app for pizzeria with client and admin modes.
- Platforms: Android, iOS, Web, Desktop
- Tech Stack: Flutter, Firebase (Auth, Firestore, Storage)
- Two modes: Client (order placement) and Admin (order management)

## Project Requirements
- Client Mode: Browse menu, add to cart, place orders, track order status
- Admin Mode: View orders real-time, modify, accept, delete, print orders
- Firebase Authentication: Separate roles for clients and admin
- Real-time updates: Orders sync instantly between clients and admin
- Multi-platform: Single codebase for all platforms
